mcap.out: The sum USD value of the current supply. Also referred to as network value or market capitalization.
txn.tfr.val.med.ntv: The median count of native units transferred per transfer (i.e., the median size of a transfer) between distinct addresses that interval.
min.rev.usd: The sum USD value of all miner revenue, which constitutes fees plus newly issued native units, represented as the US dollar amount earned if all native units were sold at the closing price on the same day.
exch.sply.usd: The sum USD value of all native units held in hot or cold exchange wallets that interval.
exch.flow.in.usd: The sum USD value sent to exchanges that interval, excluding exchange to exchange activity.
nvt.adj: The ratio of the network value (or market capitalization, current supply) divided by the adjusted transfer value. Also referred to as NVT.
txn.tsfr.cnt: The sum count of transfers that interval. Transfers represent movements of native units from one ledger entity to another distinct ledger entity. Only transfers that are the result of a transaction and that have a positive (non-zero) value are counted.
daily.shp: The Sharpe ratio (performance of the asset compared to a "risk-free" asset) over a window of time)
exch.flow.out.ntv.incl: The amount of the asset withdrawn from exchanges that interval, including exchange to exchange activity.
iss.rate: The percentage of new native units (continuous) issued over that interval, extrapolated to one year (i.e., multiplied by 365), and divided by the current supply at the end of that interval. Also referred to as the annual inflation rate.
exch.flow.in.ntv.incl: The amount of the asset sent to exchanges that interval, including exchange to exchange activity.
exch.flow.out.ntv: The amount of the asset withdrawn from exchanges that interval, excluding exchange to exchange activity.
diff.avg: The mean difficulty of finding a hash that meets the protocol-designated requirement (i.e., the difficulty of finding a new block) that interval. The requirement is unique to each applicable cryptocurrency protocol.
txn.tfr.avg.ntv: The sum value of native units transferred divided by the count of transfers (i.e., the mean size of a transfer) between distinct addresses that interval.
txn.vol: The sum USD value of all native units transferred (i.e., the aggregate size in USD of all transfers).
act.addr.cnt: The sum count of unique addresses that were active in the network (either as a recipient or originator of a ledger change) that interval. All parties in a ledger change action (recipients and originators) are counted. Individual addresses are not double-counted.
txn.tfr.erc721.cnt: The sum count of ERC-721 transfers in that interval. Only transfers between two distinct addresses are counted. ERC-165 is used to determine a contract’s compliance with ERC-721.
mcap.circ: The circulating marketcap is the price of the asset multiplied by the circulating supply. If no price is found for an asset because no trades occurred, the last price of the last trade is used. After 30 days with no trades, a marketcap of 0 is reported until trading resumes.
sply.total.iss: The sum USD value of all new native units issued that interval.
txn.tsfr.val.avg: The sum USD value of native units transferred divided by the count of transfers (i.e., the mean "size" in USD of a transfer).
blk.size.bytes.avg: The mean size (in bytes) of all blocks created
txn.cnt: The sum count of transactions that interval. Transactions represent a bundle of intended actions to alter the ledger initiated by a user (human or machine). Transactions are counted whether they execute or not and whether they result in the transfer of native units.
txn.fee.med: The USD value of the median fee per transaction that interval.
exch.flow.out.usd: The sum USD value withdrawn from exchanges that interval, excluding exchange to exchange activity.
reddit.subscribers: The number of subscribers on the asset's primary subreddit
txn.fee.avg: The USD value of the mean fee per transaction that interval.
hashrate: The mean rate at which miners are solving hashes that interval.
blk.size.byte: The sum of the size (in bytes) of all blocks created each day
fees.ntv: The sum of all fees paid to miners in native units. Fees do not include new issuance.
mcap.realized: The sum USD value based on the USD closing price on the day that a native unit last moved (i.e., last transacted) for all native units.
txn.tfr.erc20.cnt: The sum count of ERC-20 transfers in that interval. Only non-zero transfers between two distinct addresses are counted. Contracts that contain all of the following are considered to be ERC-20 contracts: the balanceOf function, the transfer function, and the Transfer event hash.
mcap.dom: The marketcap dominance is the asset's percentage share of total crypto circulating marketcap
txn.fee.med.ntv: The median fee per transaction in native units that interval.
exch.flow.in.ntv: The amount of the asset sent to exchanges that interval, excluding exchange to exchange activity.
txn.tfr.val.med: The median USD value transferred per transfer (i.e., the median size in USD of a transfer) between distinct addresses that interval.
exch.flow.in.usd.incl: The sum USD value sent to exchanges that interval, including exchange to exchange activity.
sply.total.iss.ntv: The sum of all new native units issued that interval.
exch.sply: The sum of all native units held in hot or cold exchange wallets that interval.
sply.out: The sum of all native units ever created and visible on the ledger (i.e., issued) at the end of that interval. For account-based protocols, only accounts with positive balances are counted.
daily.vol: The annualized standard-deviation of daily returns over a window of time
fees: The sum USD value of all fees paid to miners that interval. Fees do not include new issuance.
blk.cnt: The sum count of blocks created each day
new.iss.ntv: The sum of new native units issued that interval. Only those native units that are issued by a protocol-mandated continuous emission schedule are included (i.e., units manually released from escrow or otherwise disbursed are not included).
new.iss.usd: The sum USD value of new native units issued that interval. Only those native units that are issued by a protocol-mandated continuous emission schedule are included (i.e., units manually released from escrow or otherwise disbursed are not included).
exch.flow.out.usd.incl: The sum USD value withdrawn from exchanges that interval, including exchange to exchange activity.
sply.circ: The circulating supply acknowledges that tokens may be held by projects/foundations which have no intent to sell down their positions, but which have not locked up supply in a formal contract. Thus, circulating supply does not include known project treasury holdings (which can be significant). Note that an investor must carefully consider both liquid and circulating supplies when evaluating an asset, and the two can vary significantly. A risk of depending entirely on circulating supply is that the number can change dramatically based on discretionary sales from project treasuries.
txn.tfr.val.ntv: The sum of native units transferred (i.e., the aggregate size of all transfers) between distinct addresses that interval.
price: Volume weighted average price computed using Messari Methodology
txn.tsfr.val.adj: The sum USD value of all native units transferred removing noise and certain artifacts.
txn.fee.avg.ntv: The mean fee per transaction in native units that interval.
nvt.adj.90d.ma: The ratio of the network value (or market capitalization, current supply) to the 90-day moving average of the adjusted transfer value. Also referred to as NVT.
min.rev.ntv: The sum of all miner revenue, which constitutes fees plus newly issued native units.
txn.tfr.val.adj.ntv: The sum of native units transferred between distinct addresses that interval removing noise and certain artifacts.
real.vol: It is well known that many exchanges conduct wash trading practices in order to inflate trading volume. They are incentivized to report inflated volumes in order to attract traders. "Real Volume" refers to the total volume on the exchanges that we believe with high level of confidence are free of wash trading activities. However, that does not necessarily mean that the volume reported by other exchanges is 100% wash trades. As such, the Messari "Real Volume" applies a penalty to these exchanges to discount the volume believed to come from wash trading activity. For more information, see our methodology page.
reddit.active.users: The number of active users on the asset's primary subreddit
